page.description: You can use data binding to create new tables with fields that can then be used in the UX component. This is done on the '[Data Binding]' page of the UX Builder. Once the data from a new or existing table has been bound to the component you can use the properties in this section to bind a control to one of the fields in the databound table. It is also possible to match controls to a data bound table on the Data Binding page itself.
